content.p: Explore our collections with our physical and online exhibitions and galleries. Weston Gallery is part of Nottingham Lakeside Arts provides the public showcase for the Universityâ€™s prized and unique manuscript and rare book collections. At least three exhibitions are mounted each year. The items on display represent only a taste of our rich and varied holdings. Visit the Weston Gallery Kings Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 4565 fax: +44 (0) 115 846 8651 email: mss-library@nottingham.ac.uk
